snippet: David Letterman, the host of CBS’s “Late Show With David Letterman,” said he would retire when his contract ran out in 2015. Now the speculation begins on who will succeed him.
abstract: David Letterman, host of CBS’s Late Show With David Letterman, says he will retire when his contract runs out in 2015; speculation begins on who will succeed longest-running host in history of late-night television.
lead_paragraph: David Letterman, the host of CBS’s “Late Show With David Letterman,” said he would retire when his contract ran out in 2015. Now the speculation begins on who will succeed him.

headline.main: After 3 Decades, Letterman Says He Will Sign Off
headline.print_headline: 3 Decades In, Letterman Says He Will Sign Off
